item.description:
Back by popular demand (and an over abundance of t-shirts) the Drink & Drool is back (to ease the pain of the end of the summer!). That's right folks - It's Drink & Drool time - AGAIN!!

Here's the schedule:
4-4:30 Green Dragon, 11 Marshall Street
4:30-5 Hennessy's, 25 Union Street
5-5:30 The Tap, 19 Union Street
5:30-6 Purple Shamrock, 1 Union Street
6-6:30 Black Horse Tavern, 340 Faneuil Hall Marketplace
6:30-7 Hong Kong, 65 Chatham Street
7-7:30 Black Rose, 160 State Street
7:30-8 Clark's in Faneuil Hall, 21 Merchant's Row
8-8:30 Hub Pub, 18 Province Street
8:30-9 Beantown Pub, 100 Tremont Street
9-9:30 21st Amendment, 150 Bowdoin Street - Beacon Hill
9:30-10 Kinsale Irish Pub, 2 Center Plaza

I won't be bringing any t-shirts to the crawl this time around so if you'd like a shirt, let me know so we can make arrangements this week. The design is the same - the shirt is light blue, but $5 this time around.

Here are the shirt sizes and quantities that are still available:

Small (6)
Medium (14)
Large (14)
XL (3)
2XL (6)
3XL (1)

Alright ladies and gents - rest up and I look forward to seeing you all on Saturday!!
item.how_to_find_us: Everyone will be wearing light blue t-shirts with the logo on the back
item.name: 7th Annual Drink & Drool Pub Crawl - Part DEUX!
